contentrichtext.text: {{About|the acronym SR|the abbreviation|Sr (disambiguation)}} {{Wiktionary}} '''SR''' as an acronym may refer to: {{TOCright}} == Geography and politics == * [[Slovak Republic]], a former country now known as Slovakia * [[Socialist Republic]] or socialist state * Socialist-Revolutionary, as in [[Socialist-Revolutionary Party]] * [[A Just Russia]] (''Spravedlivaya Rossiya''), a Russian political party == Non-political organizations == * [[Sørvágs Róðrarfelag]], a Faroese rowing association * [[Saarländischer Rundfunk]], a German regional public broadcasting company * [[Sveriges Radio]], a Swedish national publicly funded radio broadcasting company == Science == * [[Steradian]], the SI unit of solid angle * Sedimentation rate, shortened form for [[Erythrocyte sedimentation rate]] * [[Sarcoplasmic reticulum]], a structure found within muscle cells * [[Sinus rhythm]], the pattern made by a healthy heart on an electrocardiogram * Sodium ricinoleate, compound used in [[SR toothpaste]] * [[Special relativity]], a theory of space and time created by physicist Albert Einstein * Single-reduction, a [[Steam turbine#Speed reduction|type of steam turbine]] * [[Strontium]], a chemical element of the alkaline earth metals group * [[Sustained release]] or slow release formulation of a medicine, e.g. Wellbutrin SR * [[Synchrotron radiation]], electromagnetic radiation from charged particles moving in magnetic fields * [[Systematic review]] or standardized review * [[Stimulus-response]], a term used in psychology or criminology * [[SR protein]], a type of proteins which are involved in regulating and selecting splice sites in eukaryotic mRNA == Technology == * [[Selective repeat]], a type of Automatic Repeat-reQuest Protocol * [[Shift register]], a group of processor registers set up in a linear fashion * [[Slew rate]], the maximum rate of change of electrical signals * [[Sound reinforcement]], a high-power audio system * [[Speech recognition]], the process of converting speech to text * [[SR flip-flop circuit]], an electronic logic device * [[SR programming language]], a concurrent computer programming language * [[Steam reforming]], the catalytic reaction of hydrocarbon with steam * [[Symbol rate]], a term used in data transmission == Transportation == * [[Southern Railway Zone]], a zone in Indian Railways * [[Southern Railway (United Kingdom)]] * [[Southern Railway (U.S.)]] * [[State route]], a designation for highways in some American states * the IATA code for the [[Swissair]] airline * [[Nissan SR engine]] * an abbreviation for [[Sun Roof]] usually in motor sales advertising * [[Saunders-Roe]], a former British aircraft manufacturer * [[Manx SR]] and SR2, 1970 American kit cars based on the Volkswagen Beetle frame == Music == * [[Suburban Rhythm]], a ska/punk band * [[Straylight Run]], an American alternative/indie band * [[Simply Red]], a pop/rock band * [[Steve Rothery]], a guitarist of Marillion * [[Sigur Rós]], an Icelandic post-rock band == Gaming == * [[Saints Row (series)|''Saints Row'' (series)]], a video game series ** [[Saints Row (video game)|''Saints Row'' (video game)]], the first title in the series * ''[[Shadowrun]]'', a cyberpunk fantasy roleplaying game * Several video games featuring Sonic the Hedgehog, including: ** ''[[Sonic R]]'' ** ''[[Sonic Riders]]'' ** ''[[Sonic Rush]]'' * ''[[Soul Reaver]]'', the sequel to ''Blood Omen'' in the ''Legacy of Kain'' series * [[Space Rangers (video game)|''Space Rangers'' (video game)]], a turn-based space trading and combat simulator == Film, television and literature == * ''[[School Rumble]]'', an anime and manga series * ''[[Speed Racer]]'', a manga and anime series from the 60s ** ''[[Speed Racer (film)]]'', a live-action adaptation of the anime series * ''[[Superman Returns]]'', a 2006 film based on the iconic superhero * [[Skarloey Railway]], a fictional railway in both ''The Railway Series'' and ''Thomas the Tank Engine and Friends'' by W.V. Awdry == Other == * [[Saudi riyal]], the currency of Saudi Arabia * [[Steel Reserve]], an alcoholic beverage * [[Scoville rating]], a measure of the "hotness" of a chili pepper * [[Spelling reform]], demonstrably different from simplified spelling * ''Strategic Reconnaissance'', a code used for the [[Blackbird (plane)]] * [[Slot receiver]], a position in American football {{disambiguation}}
